data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Scheme of Arrangement
data.news_body: We refer to our Letter dated December 03 2025 pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Regulation 37(6) of the SEBI LODR Regulations 2015 please find enclosed the draft Scheme of Merger of Wholly Owned Subsidiary of the Company with the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Scheme of Arrangement
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on December 03 2025 subject to the requisite approvals / consents approved the Scheme of Arrangement and Merger pursuant to the applicable provisions of the Companies Act 2013.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Board Meeting Outcome For I) Further Equity Investment In WOS Of The Company And Ii) Scheme Of Arrangement And Merger
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on December 03 2025 subject to requisite approvals/consents approved the Scheme of Arrangement and Merger of One Two Three Greetings (India) Private Limited (123G or Transferor Company) wholly owned subsidiary of the Company with the Company. The Appointed Date of the Scheme would be April 01 2025. The meeting commenced at 03:00 P.M. and concluded at 04:00 P.M.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Period Ended 31 March 2023.
data.news_body:
The Board in its Meeting held today, have amongst other matters considered, approved and taken on record the following:

1. Audited Standalone and Consolidated financial results for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2023;
2. Auditors' Report on Standalone and consolidated financial results for the financial year ended 31st March, 2023;
3. To conserve the resources of the Company for new future initiatives the Board of Directors of the Company has not proposed any dividend for the financial year ending 31st March, 2023.
